name: IbeganToLoseCTRL
description:
The game was created for GMTK jam 2020 with the theme 'out of control'

Controls:

  • Move with WASD, or arrows + spacebar
  • Reset levels with 'R'
  • When music starts, you can toggle with 'M'
  • left or right CTRL to move control cursor
  • you have a limited number of CTRL presses per level (avoid being... out of CTRL)
  • you only have control on entities a limited time
  • 15 levels to complete

Sources:

  • game made with GameMaker
  • Inspired by John Lennon song 'Jealous GUI'
  • Music made with OpenMPT
  • Sounds generated with SFXR
  • Font is Merienda One from Eduardo Tunni
